a.n: Une Soir√©e de Poche: Son Lux

p.k: Son Lux is the dream of Los Angeles composer Ryan Lott, made possible with the help of two New Yorkers: guitarist Rafiq Bhatia and drummer Ian Chang.
p.d: Son Lux is the dream of Los Angeles composer Ryan Lott, made possible with the help of two New Yorkers: guitarist Rafiq Bhatia and drummer Ian Chang. These three writers, producers, and performers show eclectic musical tastes and a penchant for unbridled improvisation. Son Lux offers a unique mix of electronic pop, unusual soul, and pure experimentation.
